column4: is there a dead simple way to get vnc (server) working on a default installation of dapper?
thats what im using right now im downstairs on my laptop connected to linux box upstairs
any other configuration I need to do?
Just install on your other client
and open the client enter the ip of the ubuntu computer
does it start automatically? the server I mean
and its good to good to go
if you have a font problem just copy the error and enter it in google and it will tell you how to fix
